introduction: Log in to your student finance account or sign up. Once registered, you can apply for student finance, see when payments are due, track your application and change your details.
more_information:
Currently only full-time students whose course started on or after 1 September 2012 can apply.

If your course starts after 1 September 2013 you can apply from January 2013.

If you can't apply online call the helpline. 

Part-time students must apply by post. The address is on the form.

$D [Download 'Tuition Fee Loan application form for new part-time students 2012/13' (PDF, 714KB)](http://www.dwp.gov.uk/advisers/claimforms/sf200_print.pdf "Download 'Tuition Fee Loan application form for new part-time students 2012/13' (PDF, 714KB)"){:rel="external"} $D

^If you've forgotten your log in, [reset your password and find your details.](https://secure.studentfinance.direct.gov.uk/portal/page?_pageid=379,1732148&_dad=portal&_schema=PORTAL "Reset your password and find your details"){:rel="external"}^

$C
**Student Finance England**  
**Telephone:** 0845 300 50 90  
**Minicom:** 0845 604 44 34  
Monday to Friday 8am to 8pm  
Saturday and Sunday 9am to 5:30pm
$C

##Update your details
You can change your address, course and bank details through your student finance account. 

Contact Student Finance England if:

- your household income changes 
- your name changes
- your marital status changes
- your parents have more children
overview: Log in to your student finance account or sign up for a new one - see when your payments are due,  track your application, change your details and apply for new finance
title: Register or log in to student finance
